posts.post_content:
If this set already has its Powerpuff Girls, then is this Mojo Jojo? D:  
He likes to be called Mr. Card Advantage. Besides the obligatory [Kaalia of the Vast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kaalia of the Vast) link found on just about every angel, demon, and dragon in the game, he also goes well with [Kuro, Pitlord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kuro, Pitlord). The lifelink offsets Kuro's ability, and the card draw is icing on the cake.

Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Necropotence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necropotence)'s model should never be attempted. 1 life for 1 card has always proven to be broken. [Yawgmoth's Bargain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yawgmoth's Bargain) was another example. This card is obviously weaker then both of those, but that still does not excuse it. [Greed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Greed) should be the model used whenever they want this effect. 7 cards for 14 life would still be incredible.  
  
.5/5 for foolish developers. With any luck, we will never see this broken model again.
posts.html:
Necropotence's model should never be attempted. 1 life for 1 card has always proven to be broken. Yawgmoth's Bargain was another example. This card is obviously weaker then both of those, but that still does not excuse it. Greed should be the model used whenever they want this effect. 7 cards for 14 life would still be incredible.

.5/5 for foolish developers. With any luck, we will never see this broken model again.

"Here at Yawgmoth's Emporium, we're dedicated to bringing you the best deals for card drawing in the multiverse. If you liked our incredible " [Yawgmoth's Bargain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yawgmoth's Bargain) " deal, you'll love our new Griselbrand bundle, you keep your same low, low, low, life to card cost, with addition of an efficient beater, for only 2 extra mana, and a 7 card contract!
